input: User: mid-twenties female who loves romantic movies
output: I recommend the movie ‘Love, Rosie’ for the mid-twenties female who loves romantic movies. The movie follows the story of childhood friends, Rosie and Alex, who attempt to navigate adulthood while struggling to maintain a romantic relationship.
